title: Chanel No. 5 Eau de Parfum - Classic Floral Fragrance for Women
description: Indulge in the timeless elegance of Chanel No. 5 Eau de Parfum. This classic floral fragrance features a sophisticated blend of ylang-ylang, jasmine, and rose, complemented by warm sandalwood and vanilla notes. Launched in 1921, Chanel No. 5 remains a symbol of grace and luxury, offering a refined and enduring scent experience. Perfect for both daytime and evening wear, this fragrance is a must-have for women who appreciate the finer things in life. Its iconic bottle design reflects the classic beauty of the perfume itself.
key_features: Classic floral fragrance with ylang-ylang, jasmine, and rose
Suitable for both daytime and evening wear
Iconic bottle design reflecting classic beauty
meta_title: Chanel No. 5 Eau de Parfum - Classic Floral Fragrance for Women
meta_description: Buy Chanel No. 5 Eau de Parfum - a classic floral fragrance for women. Featuring notes of ylang-ylang, jasmine, and rose, this timeless perfume offers elegance and sophistication.
